#summary Installation of the MxUpdate Eclipse Plug-In
#sidebar Eclipse_Index
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Download and Install =

Download the plugin zip container from the [http://code.google.com/p/mxupdate/downloads/list Downloads].

Unpack the zip container under ecplipse/plugins folder.

Replace in the lib directory the empty placeholder jar file eMatrixServletRMI.jar from the original MX installation.
